text:
*[Bug 18955] cairo library update 1.16 -> 1.18 seems to break font embedding into PDF (R 4.3 -> 4.4 transition)*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18955>

--- Comment #18 from Kristian Vlahovicek (<mailto:kristian@bioinfo.hr|kristian@bioinfo.hr>) ---
Thank you Tomas (no diacritics in bugzilla), Paul and Simon for pushing this
through! I appreciate very much all the help!

Although recompiling the toolchain was fun (btw Tomas, I see you have updated
the MXE gcc to 14.3 ;) ) and fairly straightforward, I'm really happy you
spared me the chore :)
